description: The Mt Shasta Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Mt Shasta for the snow report
Alexa, ask Mt Shasta for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Mt Shasta
shortDescription: The Mt Shasta Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Mt Shasta.
